nodes.text: The Rampart was a ship that had been stolen by Tobias Beckett. He used it after stealing identichips on Hovun IV, but was forced to destroy it on the space station Munt Ontdal to prevent Enfys Nest from getting her hands on them.
Rampart is the name of a 2011 film starring Woody Harrelson, who portrayed Tobias Beckett in Solo: A Star Wars Story.
